mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO project(customer_seq, main_manager_id, company_seq, company_staff_seq, main_company_seq, main_company_staff_seq, project_name, start_year, start_month, start_day, end_year, end_month, end_day, sido, sigungu, detail_addr, project_desc, customer_memo,register_manager_id, register_ymdt, end_yn)
VALUES (#{customerSeq}, #{mainManagerId}, #{companySeq}, #{companyStaffSeq}, #{mainCompanySeq}, #{mainCompanyStaffSeq}, #{projectName}, #{startYear}, #{startMonth}, #{startDay}, #{endYear}, #{endMonth}, #{endDay}, #{sido}, #{siGunGu}, #{detailAddr}, #{projectDesc}, #{customerMemo}, #{registerYmdt}, #{resiterManagerId}, 'N')
